FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command clears statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses. The reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command clears statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics { interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-num> } | all }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Clears statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses on all interfaces.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics all
ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses, run the reset ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command.
